dmca.title: Froogle DMCA complaint - Net Enforcer11 - Alpine
dmca.body:
Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [ Alpine ] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [ Alpine ] / :
 

www.lgdsuperstore.com                       IVA-W200
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.lgdsuperstore.com/picture.aspx%3Fimg%3D100874_1.jpg&size=2&dhm=d981d2e&hl=en
 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [Derek S. Piotrowicz ]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [P.O. Box 2132]
City and State: [Gainesville, FL]
Zip: [32601 ]
Email [dpiotrowicz@netenforcers.com]
Fax: [954.827.2381]
Date: [ 10/3/06]
 

Truthfully,
Derek S. Piotrowicz
